cInteractionSettings Class Reference
[Force Rendering Algorithms]

This structure contains a list of settings which are passed to the interaction detector when checking for an interaction. More...

#include <CInteractionBasics.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

bool m_checkVisibleObjectsOnly
 If true, then collision detector shall check for collisions on visible objects only.
bool m_checkHapticObjectsOnly
 If true, then collision detector shall check for collisions on haptic enabled objects only.

Detailed Description

This structure contains a list of settings which are passed to the interaction detector when checking for an interaction.
